channel.title: onEdit on Marios Karamanis
channel.description: Recent content in onEdit on Marios Karamanis

item.title: Generate timestamps upon edits - Basic onEdit(e) example
item.description: Goal: The goal of this script is to generate a timestamp on a particular column and sheet upon edits on cells of another column but same sheet. It is a very basic script and can be generalized to many other scenarios as well. The onEdit(e) trigger function: This article demonstrates the basic use of an onEdit(e) along with the use of the event object. The latter contains useful information regarding the on edit interaction with the sheet.
